title: Understanding Disease Experiences Through Humanities: Integrated Inquiry with Mathematical Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and humanities-based texts
context.additional_context: For mathematics graduate students, exploring how humanities-based approaches analyze disease experiences and learning to structure patient experiences through mathematical modeling

learning_goals: Learners can analyze humanities works (literature, film, drama, etc.) to explain subjective elements of disease experiences
Learners can derive social/emotional patterns by mathematically modeling disease and patient experiences
Learners can synthesize interdisciplinary insights through online discussions and asynchronous collaboration
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
